pizzas.name: Margherita
pizzas.description: Classic Italian pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.

pizzas.description: Traditional pizza topped with pepperoni slices and mozzarella cheese.

pizzas.name: Vegetarian
pizzas.description: A delicious blend of fresh vegetables including bell peppers, mushrooms, onions, and olives.

pizzas.name: Hawaiian
pizzas.description: Sweet and savory pizza with ham, pineapple chunks, and mozzarella cheese.

pizzas.name: Quattro Formaggi
pizzas.description: A cheese lover's delight with a combination of four cheeses: mozzarella, gorgonzola, fontina, and parmesan.

pizzas.name: Mediterranean
pizzas.description: Mouthwatering pizza with Mediterranean flavors including feta cheese, olives, sun-dried tomatoes, and fresh herbs.

pizzas.description: Pizza with spicy buffalo sauce, grilled chicken, and ranch dressing.

pizzas.name: Chicken Alfredo
pizzas.description: Creamy Alfredo sauce, grilled chicken, and mozzarella cheese on a thin crust.

pizzas.name: Vegan Delight
pizzas.description: Vegan pizza with plant-based cheese, fresh vegetables, and a gluten-free crust.

pizzas.name: Truffle Mushroom
pizzas.description: Pizza topped with truffle oil, wild mushrooms, caramelized onions, and fontina cheese.

pizzas.name: Spinach and Feta
pizzas.description: Pizza with garlic-infused olive oil, spinach, feta cheese, and black olives.

pizzas.name: Pesto Primavera
pizzas.description: Pizza topped with pesto sauce, fresh tomatoes, bell peppers, zucchini, and mozzarella cheese.

pizzas.description: Pizza with Italian sausage, saut√©ed mushrooms, and melted provolone cheese.

pizzas.description: Pizza topped with barbecue sauce, crispy bacon, red onions, and cheddar cheese.

pizzas.name: Greek Style
pizzas.description: Pizza with kalamata olives, red onions, cherry tomatoes, feta cheese, and a drizzle of olive oil.

pizzas.name: Caprese
pizzas.description: Pizza topped with fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced tomatoes, basil leaves, and balsamic glaze.
